org.phantomapi.wraith

Class VariableBlock

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.phantomapi.wraith.VariableBlock

  • public class VariableBlock
extends Object
    Represents a block that can be multiple blocks (used for variable schematics)
    Author:
    cyberpwn
